messages.title: POLICIES SHARED BY CONSERVATIVES, LIB DEMS, LABOUR & UKIP
messages.content: Vote for Lib Lab Con UKIP and this is what you’ll get: No national policy to end waste incineration, Support for fracking, Support for genetically modified crops, Continued austerity/public sector cuts, No end to the UK’s tax haven culture, Bankers with massive bonuses, Ongoing privatisation of the NHS (started by Labour, continued by ConDems)

messages.title: GREEN PARTY COSTED POLICIES
messages.content: No more incineration and no fracking, End NHS privatisation, Bring railways into public ownership, Restore education maintenance allowance, End tuition fees, No Academy Schools, Scrap Trident, Scrap HS2, A financial transaction tax.

messages.title: GREEN SUCCESS
messages.content: MP directly elected for Brighton (not by jumping ship like UKIP), Green Party MEP for the South West, Green Party membership quadrupled in the past year, More UK members than Lib Dems or UKIP, Part of Stroud District Council Administration, Stroud Green Party Vote Share (most recent in Stroud District): 18.5% 2014 District Council, 17.1% 2014 EU, 18.0% 2013 County Council.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: No more incineration and no fracking, End NHS privatisation
Restore education maintenance allowance, End tuition fees

issues.education: Restore education maintenance allowance, End tuition fees
issues.environment: No more incineration and no fracking

images.caption: Sarah Lunnon, Green Party General Election Candidate

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet promotes the Green Party's successes and its distinct policies that contrast with the policies shared by the main political parties. It also encourages support for Sarah Lunnon and engagement with the Green Party's platforms.
